title: New Pokémon Snap arrives on April 30!
author: The Official Pokémon YouTube channel
description:
Are you ready for your close-up, Trainers? 

Your journey through the photogenic Lental region begins on Friday, April 30! 

Can’t wait? Preorders begin today! 📸  https://bit.ly/2LMHcpJ

Official site: https://newpokemonsnap.pokemon.com/
Shop: http://www.pokemoncenter.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon 
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pokemon

localize.description:
你准备好特写了吗，柴尔德人？

4月30日星期五，你的Lental地区摄影之旅就将开始了! 

等不及了？今天开始预购 📸 https://bit.ly/2LMHcpJ
